model.description: Total number of gRPC calls handled per second, grouped by method. Useful for monitoring overall traffic volume and per-method activity.
model.title: Request Rate gRPC

model.description: Shows high-percentile latency per gRPC method over the selected range, excluding the ActivateJobs method.
model.title: p95 Latency gRPC

model.description: Fraction of gRPC requests resulting in INTERNAL errors per method. High values may indicate server-side issues or crashes.

targets.expr: sum by(grpc_method) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{camunda_region=~"$region", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_method=~"$grpc_method", grpc_code="INTERNAL"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(grpc_method) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{camunda_region=~"$region", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_method=~"$grpc_method"}[$__rate_interval]))

model.title: Error Rate gRPC

model.description: Raw increase of latency bucket counts over time for all methods excluding ActivateJobs. Useful for histogram exploration and debugging tail latencies.
model.title: Latency Heatmap gRPC

model.description: Highest-requested API endpoints based on request rate, excluding internal /actuator and Prometheus paths.
model.title: Request Rate REST

model.description: Highest-requested API endpoints based on request rate, excluding internal /actuator and Prometheus paths.
model.title: Request Rate REST (top 10)

model.description: Endpoints with the highest average request duration, excluding known internal and noisy paths.
model.title: Average Latency REST

model.description: Endpoints with the highest average request duration, excluding known internal and noisy paths.
model.title: Average Latency REST (top 10)

model.description: Endpoints with the highest proportion of server-side errors (5xx), useful for spotting failing API routes.
model.title: Server error rate REST

model.description: Endpoints with the highest proportion of server-side errors (5xx), useful for spotting failing API routes.
model.title: Server error rate REST (top 10)

model.description: Endpoints with the highest proportion of server-side errors (5xx), useful for spotting failing API routes.
model.title: Client error rate REST

model.description: Endpoints with the highest proportion of server-side errors (4xx).
model.title: Client error rate REST (top 10)

panels.description: Total number of gRPC calls handled per second, grouped by method. Useful for monitoring overall traffic volume and per-method activity.
panels.title: Request Rate gRPC

panels.description: Shows high-percentile latency per gRPC method over the selected range, excluding the ActivateJobs method.
panels.title: p95 Latency gRPC

panels.description: Fraction of gRPC requests resulting in errors per method. High values may indicate server-side issues or crashes.
panels.title: Error Rate gRPC
